{{Infobox Berry |name = #66 Starf |image = [[File:Starf.png]] |caption = This Berry is considered a mirage. It was said to be so strong that it had to be abandoned at the world's edge. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} === Description === '''Starf''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least 1 empty plot while encountering a shiny wandering pokemon. The [[Occa]] or any later berry must be unlocked to unlock this berry. It emits an aura that increases the [[Shiny Chance]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 5 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (shiny chance) | ||
x1.005 ||
x1.01 ||
x1.015 |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
5 days ||
--- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 16 hours -
80 hours ||
192 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
53 hours 20 mins ||
128 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[Farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry. Note that the setup omits a 24th [[Roseli]] as that would allow the mutation of the [[Custap]] which would occupy the empty plot. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]]

{{Infobox Berry |name = #66 Starf |image = [[File:Starf.png]] |caption = This Berry is considered a mirage. It was said to be so strong that it had to be abandoned at the world's edge. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} === Description === '''Starf''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least 1 empty plot while encountering a shiny wandering pokemon. The [[Salac]] or any later berry must be unlocked to unlock this berry. It emits an aura that increases the [[Shiny Chance]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! 128 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[Farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry.
